SELECT seq, user_id, TO_CHAR(login_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS login_time, state, channel, os, browser, ip_address FROM LOGINLOG WHERE 1=1
AND login_time >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND login_time <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1' DAY
AND user_id LIKE '%' || #{userId} || '%'
AND ip_address LIKE '%' || #{ip} || '%'
ORDER BY seq DESC
